explanation-f: I work on the configuration and parameterization of subjects in Moodle, ensuring the structure and operation of EAD courses. I provide technical support to the poles, solving demands related to the platform. I collaborate with pedagogical teams for adjustments and improvements. I validate content and functionality before release to students.
explanation-c: Internship focused on the Java language with the Springboot framework, also using AWS as a cloud server. As the Scrum agile methodology will be applied, the work done will be conducted by instructors and the Scrum Master.
campus: Federal Institute of Paraná - Paranavaí Campus IFPR
curso: Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering - 3rd Year
cedi-texto: CEDI: The CEDI is an extension project dedicated to software development. Currently, it is involved in the implementation of an association management system, with the backend implemented in NODEJS and the frontend developed in ReactJS.
